game.name: Knockout 2: Wrath of the Karen
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SAVE THE WORLD — As an FBI agent, research a terrifying disease spreading across the country in this classic Punch-Out!!-inspired game. However, a much darker, older secret lurks in the shadows, and an ancient evil rises to threaten national security, the world, and your quarterly performance bonus.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SAVE THE WORLD — As an FBI agent, research a terrifying disease spreading across the country in this classic Punch-Out!!-inspired game. However, a much darker, older secret lurks in the shadows, and an ancient evil rises to threaten national security, the world, and your quarterly performance bonus.
